abstract.p: Topological edge states can emerge not only in a fermionic electron system but also in a bosonic system. Here, Nawa et al. report topologically nontrivial triplon bands in a two-dimensional dimerized quantum antiferromagnet Ba 2CuSi 2O 6Cl 2, suggesting a bosonic realization of the coupled Su-Schrieffer-Heeger model.
